items.title: Hotel Diagonal Zero
items.info:
Send an email to clara@barcelonajug.org with subject "Offer Diagonal Zero" informing you're interested in this offer.
Limited number of room available in the offer.

items.title: Train - AVE (High Speed) - Long Distance
items.info: Send an email to clara@barcelonajug.org with subject "Discount Renfe" and inform your reservation id to get the discount code.
